name: CareLuLu, Inc.
description: Operator of an online marketplace designed to ensure every child has access to safe, affordable, high-quality child care and early education. The company's marketplace connects parents to licensed daycares and preschools and offers a criteria-based search and detailed information on childcare providers such as cost, hours, photos, and verified reviews, enabling parents to find safe and affordable childcare and early education for their kids.
